title: Bedřich Koutný
text: Bedřich Koutný (born 6 March 1931) is a Czechoslovak <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201952%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Middleweight">men's middleweight</a> event at the <a href="1952%20Summer%20Olympics">1952 Summer Olympics</a>.
